attributes.action: Revoke The Licences of Licenced Establishments That Fail To Comply with The Ban on Smoking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if establishments such as pubs, restaurants etc fail to comply with the ban then they should face the prospect of having their licences revoked. The smoking ban is a law, laws are not made to be broken just because some people don't agree with it.
